channel.title: How to edit ice barrage
channel.description: i cant use ice barrage on players in pking only can use on npc[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2007, 09:49:01 PM[/size][hr]some1 post plz how to use barrage on players

item.title: How to edit ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

Hmm hold on, if its freezing a player and you have castonplayer.entangle, you need to edit your walk on command case, give me a second, and ill get it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: How to edit ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @Darque_Star Darque Star
item.description:
@Darque_Star wrote:

ok dude, sorry i had to edit it here, replace ur current one with BOTH OF THESE

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) (PLAYERS) BY DARQUE STAR { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(35); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } } if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage (NPC'S) BY DARQUE STAR if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((100000*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(709); server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Frozentimer = 60; } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }

REPLACE THE FIRST ONE WITH ALL OF THIS ONE,

ENJOYZZ

Read full topic

item.title: How to edit ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @Darque_Star Darque Star
item.description:
@Darque_Star wrote:

this is what i used in my client, i made it myself. tell me if it works!

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(35); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

ENJOYZZ
